description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a human hybrid and a human. For reindeer Chopper, this grants him human intelligence and the ability to walk upright.

users.circumstances: Chopper ate the fruit as a young reindeer, which gave him human-like qualities but made him an outcast from both reindeer and humans.

abilityReveals.description: A new transformation that combines martial arts proficiency with enhanced combat capabilities. Chopper uses kung fu techniques to easily defeat multiple opponents with versatile movement and powerful strikes.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Chopper uses Kung Fu Point to defend Sanji from Neptune's soldiers at Shyarly's Mermaid Cafe, easily defeating the guards with martial arts techniques he learned during his two-year training on Torino Kingdom.

strengths.description: Chopper can transform into various forms with different abilities. Kung Fu Point showcases his ability to develop new transformations.
